entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 12:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few rain showers or flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
